text: <a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-1/" title="Song of Solomon 1:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 The song of songs, which *is* Solomon's.
<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-2/" title="Song of Solomon 1:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Let him kiss me with the kisses of his mouth: for thy love *is* better than wine.

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-3/" title="Song of Solomon 1:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Because of the savour of thy good ointments thy name *is as* ointment poured forth, therefore do the virgins love thee.

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-4/" title="Song of Solomon 1:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 Draw me, we will run after thee: the king hath brought me into his chambers: we will be glad and rejoice in thee, we will remember thy love more than wine: the upright love thee.

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-5/" title="Song of Solomon 1:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 I *am* black, but comely, O ye daughters of Jerusalem, as the tents of Kedar, as the curtains of Solomon.

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-6/" title="Song of Solomon 1:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Look not upon me, because I *am* black, because the sun hath looked upon me: my mother's children were angry with me; they made me the keeper of the vineyards; *but* mine own vineyard have I not kept.

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-7/" title="Song of Solomon 1:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Tell me, O thou whom my soul loveth, where thou feedest, where thou makest *thy flock* to rest at noon: for why should I be as one that turneth aside by the flocks of thy companions?

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-8/" title="Song of Solomon 1:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 If thou know not, O thou fairest among women, go thy way forth by the footsteps of the flock, and feed thy kids beside the shepherds' tents.
<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-9/" title="Song of Solomon 1:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 I have compared thee, O my love, to a company of horses in Pharaoh's chariots.
<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-10/" title="Song of Solomon 1:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 Thy cheeks are comely with rows *of jewels*, thy neck with chains *of gold*.
<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-11/" title="Song of Solomon 1:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 We will make thee borders of gold with studs of silver.

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-12/" title="Song of Solomon 1:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 While the king *sitteth* at his table, my spikenard sendeth forth the smell thereof.

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-13/" title="Song of Solomon 1:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 A bundle of myrrh *is* my wellbeloved unto me; he shall lie all night betwixt my breasts.
<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-14/" title="Song of Solomon 1:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 My beloved *is* unto me *as* a cluster of camphire in the vineyards of Engedi.

<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-15/" title="Song of Solomon 1:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Behold, thou *art* fair, my love; behold, thou *art* fair; thou *hast* doves' eyes.
<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-16/" title="Song of Solomon 1:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Behold, thou *art* fair, my beloved, yea, pleasant: also our bed *is* green.
<a href="../Song-of-Solomon-1-17/" title="Song of Solomon 1:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 The beams of our house *are* cedar, *and* our rafters of fir.
